SUNE

SUNE is Audri Acu√±a + Jonas Margraf. We create music and audiovisual works for performances and installations.
We offer a number of creative services under the umbrella of audio and video art.
Our past projects include musical compositions for the Descience fashion show at the MIT Media Lab,
a 24-channel sound installation at Superbooth 2016, generative video work and custom software for Together Boston
and music for the ZDF broadcast of Zukunftspreis 2015, a prize for innovation in technology by the President of Germany.
